name: Survival RPG 2: Temple Ruins
description:
Survival RPG 2: The temple ruins is the sequel of the first retro game : Survival RPG - The lost treasure. It is 2d RPG and survival retro game. It combines quests, exploration, crafting and survival in a 2d pixel art universe.

On the first game, you were exploring for a lost treasure. After many combats and adventures, you came back victorious.

Now, you heard rumors of a magical artifact that lies among the temple ruins. So you decide to embark on a new journey full of adventures leading you to mysterious temples in the jungle.

In order to succeed, you will have to explore different environments: deserts, jungles, forests, dungeons, complete quests, solve puzzles, help other characters and craft items. Adventures await you.

Features:

- 7 story chapters that will bring you to the artifact.
- Exploration of more than 30 dungeons, caverns, jungles, temples and huts.
- More than 180 items to gather, mine and craft
- Multiple roleplay quests and characters to help you in your journey.
- 70 crafting recipes that you will unlock during your adventure and exploration.
- Craft tools to help you
- Cut trees with an axe
- Use shovel for different tasks
- Create candles or lantern to see in dark dungeons
- Use pickaxes to gather different minerals
- And many more...
- Discover hidden items
- Find hidden treasures with treasure maps
- Fight more than 35 different monsters and bosses
